alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Collier County through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from Golden Gate to near West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, Naples Park, Pelican Bay, Lely, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest, Port Of The Island, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Quail Creek Estate and Fiddlers Creek. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
